snippet: The National Museum of African American History and Culture, opening in September, will recognize his pioneering work in comedy and TV as well as his damaged legacy.
abstract: National Museum of African American History and Culture agrees to acknowledge sexual assault allegations against Bill Cosby in exhibition showcasing his work in comedy and television; decision follows debate on whether Cosby's work should be allowed to stand alone.
lead_paragraph: The National Museum of African American History and Culture, opening in September, will recognize his pioneering work in comedy and TV as well as his damaged legacy.

headline.main: Smithsonian Says Museum Will Include Mention of Bill Cosby Sexual Assault Accusations

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Museum of African American History and Culture
